Package org.forgerock.openam.session.service.access.persistence

Interface InternalSessionStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternalSessionPersistenceStore, InternalSessionStoreChain
    public interface InternalSessionStore
    Responsible for reading and storing InternalSessions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Stores the InternalSession in the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getBySessionID

        InternalSession getBySessionID​(SessionID sessionID)
                        throws SessionPersistenceException
        Gets a session from a given SessionID.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - the ID of the session to retrieve
        Returns:
        an Internal Session
        Throws:
        SessionPersistenceException - If the storage operation failed.

        an Internal Session

      • getByRestrictedID

        InternalSession getByRestrictedID​(SessionID sessionID)
                           throws SessionPersistenceException
        Gets a restricted session from a given SessionID.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - the ID of the restricted session to retrieve
        Returns:
        a restricted Internal Session
        Throws:
        SessionPersistenceException - If the storage operation failed.

      • create

        void create​(InternalSession session)
     throws SessionPersistenceException
        Stores the InternalSession in the cache. This will also store any associated references which have been stored on the Session:
        • Session ID
        • Session Handle
        • Restricted Tokens
        Parameters:
        session - Non null InternalSession to store.
        Throws:
        SessionPersistenceException - If the storage operation failed.

      • update

        void update​(InternalSession session)
     throws SessionPersistenceException
        Throws:
        SessionPersistenceException

      • remove

        void remove​(InternalSession session)
     throws SessionPersistenceException
        Remove the Session from the cache.
        Parameters:
        session - Non null SessionID.
        Throws:
        SessionPersistenceException - If the storage operation failed.
